text: Hi, I've been working on enabling crud operations in combination with calling api's that my visual programming editor doesn't know about (I've used supabase).. the only really new Node-type that I made is a generic data-table which can be configured in the flow-editor. The data-table gets automatically updated after doing delete/update/create operations. To give an impression, here's a screenshot:
